event.name: Mechanic Clash
event.desc: Defeat tough enemies to earn stars and rewards! All enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attack recharges stop 6 hours before event end!

event.name: Clanky Guild Clash
event.desc: Defeat tough enemies to earn stars and rewards with your guild! All enemies start with a Castle Tower card in play! Attack recharges stop 6 hours before event end!
